name: linter-perlcritic

2.3.1.name: linter-perlcritic
2.3.1.description: Linter plugin for perl, using perlcritic

level.title: Perlcritic Level of warning
level.description: If set to auto this applies a mapping between the linter log levels and perlcritic severity. It's more colorful but may be set to constant values too.

showSeverity.description: Show the severity number of the violation.

showExplanation.description: Show the short explanation or PBP page reference of the violation.

showPolicy.description: Show the policy that reported the violation.

forceMinimumSeverity.description: Force `perlcritic` to apply policies of a certain severity.

readme:
# linter-perlcritic package

Atom linter plugin for Perl, using [perlcritic](https://metacpan.org/pod/Perl::Critic).

metadata.name: linter-perlcritic
metadata.description: Linter plugin for perl, using perlcritic

level.title: Perlcritic Level of warning
level.description: If set to auto this applies a mapping between the linter log levels and perlcritic severity. It's more colorful but may be set to constant values too.

showSeverity.description: Show the severity number of the violation.

showExplanation.description: Show the short explanation or PBP page reference of the violation.

showPolicy.description: Show the policy that reported the violation.

forceMinimumSeverity.description: Force `perlcritic` to apply policies of a certain severity.
